title: North East Line stations early closure for maintenance works

updates.text: Due to intensified maintenance works, five NEL stations between NE13 Kovan & NE17 Punggol will close earlier at around 11.00pm today, 2 Nov. Shuttle Bus 21 will be in operation to serve the closed stations while Service 325 will run until 12.50am.

Due to intensified maintenance works, five NEL stations between NE13 Kovan & NE17 Punggol will close earlier at around 11.00pm today & tomorrow, 1 & 2 Nov. Shuttle Bus 21 will be in operation to serve the closed stations while Service 325 will run until 12.50am.

Due to intensified maintenance works, five NEL stations between NE13 Kovan & NE17 Punggol will close earlier at around 11.00pm this Fri & Sat – 1 & 2 Nov. Shuttle Bus 21 will be in operation to serve the closed stations while Service 325 will run until 12.50am.

Due to intensified maintenance works, five NEL stations between NE13 Kovan & NE17 Punggol will close earlier at around 11.00pm this Fri & Sat – 1 & 2 Nov. Shuttle Bus 21 will be in operation to serve the closed stations while Service 325 will run until 12.50am.

Due to intensified maintenance works, five NEL stations between NE13 Kovan & NE17 Punggol will close earlier at around 11.00pm this Fri & Sat – 1 & 2 Nov. Shuttle Bus 21 will be in operation to serve the closed stations while Service 325 will run until 12.50am.

Due to intensified maintenance works, NEL stations between NE13 Kovan & NE17 Punggol will close earlier at around 11pm on the first four Fridays & Saturdays in Nov. Shuttle Bus 21 will be in operation to serve the closed stations while Svc 325 will run until 12.50am.
